name: disqus-svelte
description: Integrate Disqus comments into Svelte applications.
readme: ### Disqus-Svelte This is a package of pre-made components used to intergrate [Disqus](https://disqus.com/) services into your Svelte Applications. #### 1. Installation: You can install using [npm](https://npmjs.com) as such: ``` npm i -D disqus-svelte ``` #### 2. Usage: ```html ``` ##### Available Props: * **Required** `identifier` : The unique identifier of the page. It will work specifying this prop, but default settings are not guaranteed to work. * **Optional** `url` : The complete URL of the page. *Default: window.location.href*. * **Optional** `container` : The class name of the Disqus Comments Thread container.. #### 3. Comment Count: ##### Setup: ```html ``` ##### Using Comment Count: ```html Link`. ``` ##### Available Props: **Required** `shortname` : The Shortname of your site provided by Disqus. **[GitHub](https://github.com/demonicious/disqus-svelte)**
